name: Jhapa Model English School
info: Jhapa Model English School is a well-established educational institution located in Damak-8, Jhapa. It offers comprehensive education from Nursery up to Grade 12, providing courses in General Education, +2 Science, +2 Management, +2 Humanities, +2 Education. The school emphasizes academic excellence, modern teaching methodologies, and holistic development of students. Students are encouraged to participate in extracurricular activities such as sports, arts, cultural programs, and community service. The dedicated teaching staff employs interactive, scientific, and student-centered pedagogical approaches to foster critical thinking and creativity. Jhapa Model English School is recognized in the local community for producing disciplined, skilled, and socially responsible graduates, and it continuously strives to maintain a safe, supportive, and motivating learning environment for all its students.

name: Adarsha Secondary School
info: Adarsha Secondary School is one of the oldest and most trusted institutions in Biratnagar. The school provides both academic and technical education, blending modern teaching methods with experienced faculty. It is known for its well-equipped computer and science laboratories, practical-based learning, and emphasis on discipline and character development.

name: Girija Prasad Koirala College of Agriculture and Research Centre
info: Girija Prasad Koirala College of Agriculture and Research Centre is dedicated to agricultural science and research. The college focuses on producing skilled manpower in food, nutrition, and sustainable agriculture practices. With advanced research facilities and experienced instructors, it contributes significantly to Nepal’s food security and agricultural innovation.

name: Kankai Aadarsh Campus
info: Kankai Adarsha Campus is a multidisciplinary community campus that provides quality education at both higher secondary and master’s level. The campus emphasizes academic excellence, community involvement, and personality development, offering a wide range of programs to suit diverse student interests. It has a strong reputation in the management and social sciences fields.

name: Madan Bhandari Memorial Academy Nepal
courses: Pre-Diploma in Livestock Production / Animal Health
info: Madan Bhandari Memorial Academy Nepal was established in memory of the late leader Madan Bhandari to uplift rural communities through education. The academy offers programs in technical, medical, and IT fields, focusing on skill development, practical training, and modern teaching methods. It has become a hub for students aiming to build careers in health, technology, and agriculture.

name: Mahendra Morang Adarsha Multiple Campus
courses: Bachelors of Arts in Social Work (BASW)
info: Mahendra Morang Adarsha Multiple Campus is one of the most prestigious public campuses in Province 1. Affiliated with Tribhuvan University, it is widely recognized for its research-based programs and highly qualified faculty. The campus offers a rich academic environment for bachelor and Ph.D. students, especially in the fields of science, social work, and research.

name: Manmohan Memorial Polytechnic
info: Manmohan Memorial Polytechnic is a government-owned technical institution offering various diploma-level engineering programs. It focuses on producing technically skilled manpower to meet Nepal’s growing demand in engineering and technology fields. The polytechnic is known for practical-based education, modern workshops, and strong placement opportunities.

name: Nobel Medical College
courses: Bachelor in Medical Laboratory Technology (B.Sc. MLT)
info: Nobel Medical College is one of Nepal’s top private medical colleges, affiliated with Kathmandu University. It is widely respected for its modern infrastructure, expert doctors as faculty, and focus on practical medical training. The college has produced thousands of successful health professionals and continues to serve as a hub for healthcare education in eastern Nepal.

name: Purbanchal University School of Management (PUSOM)
info: Purbanchal University School of Management (PUSOM) is the central management school of Purbanchal University. It is renowned for its MBA and doctoral programs, offering students exposure to international-level curriculum and research. The school emphasizes leadership, entrepreneurship, and innovation, preparing students to excel in the global business environment.

name: Sailaja Acharya Memorial Polytechnic Institute
courses: Pre-Diploma in Livestock Production / Animal Health
info: Sailaja Acharya Memorial Polytechnic Institute provides technical education aimed at producing middle-level skilled manpower. The institute focuses on agriculture and engineering disciplines, helping students gain practical skills that can be applied in industries and rural development. It is well-regarded for its affordable education and career-oriented training.

name: AIMS College Biratnagar
courses: B.Sc. Computer Science and Information Technology (B.Sc. CSIT)
info: AIMS College Biratnagar is a reputed private institution offering programs in IT, hospitality, and management. The college is known for its industry-oriented teaching, internship opportunities, and supportive learning environment. With dedicated faculty and modern facilities, AIMS has become a popular choice for students aiming to build professional careers.

name: Aagaman Campus, Sunsari
info: Aagaman Campus, located in Duhabi, Sunsari, is a reputed higher educational institution offering both Ten Plus Two and Bachelor-level programs. The campus provides courses in +2 Science, +2 Management, and +2 Education, along with Bachelor’s programs such as BBS, B.Ed, BHM, and B.Sc General. With its commitment to academic excellence and holistic development, Aagaman Campus emphasizes practical learning, critical thinking, and creativity.

name: Viswa Adarsha Secondary School, Sunsari
info: Viswa Adarsha Secondary School, situated in Sunsari, is a well-known institution providing both higher secondary and advanced-level studies. It offers programs such as BCA, BBA, and MBS. The school prepares students for dynamic professional careers with innovative teaching and modern infrastructure.

name: Alpine Group of College, Sunsari
info: Alpine Group of College, located in Dharan, Sunsari, is a modern institution offering specialized programs in IT and Engineering. The college provides BCA and B.Tech programs, focusing on innovation, industry exposure, and technical skills development.

name: Ambika Health Training School, Sunsari
courses: Proficiency Certificate in Medical Lab Technology
info: Ambika Health Training School, based in Itahari, Sunsari, is a leading institute for healthcare education. It offers Proficiency Certificate programs in Medical Lab Technology and General Medicine, focusing on practical skills, clinical expertise, and professional development.

name: Baglamukhi Multiple Technical Institute, Sunsari
courses: Pre-Diploma in Livestock Production / Animal Health
info: Baglamukhi Multiple Technical Institute, located in Itahari, Sunsari, is a prominent technical and vocational education provider. It offers various Pre-Diploma programs and Proficiency Certificate courses with a focus on skill-based training.

name: Adarsha Multiple Campus, Sunsari
info: Adarsha Multiple Campus, located in Sunsari, is a community-based higher education institution offering the BBS program. The campus focuses on business education, discipline, and leadership development.

name: Bhadgaun Sinuwari Multiple Campus, Sunsari
info: Bhadgaun Sinuwari Multiple Campus, situated in Jhumka, Sunsari, offers programs in Business Studies and Education. The campus emphasizes value-based education, practical learning, and overall student development.

name: Birendra Memorial College, Sunsari
courses: B.Sc. Computer Science and Information Technology (B.Sc. CSIT)
info: Birendra Memorial College, located in Dharan, Sunsari, provides both Bachelor’s and Master’s programs. Known for its quality education in science, IT, and business, the college emphasizes research and innovation.

name: Depot Adarsha Multiple Campus, Sunsari
info: Depot Adarsha Multiple Campus, located in Dharan, Sunsari, is a community-focused institution offering the BBS program. It blends theoretical knowledge with practical business applications.
